meanings.sent1: Wearing a tie to the party was nonobligatory.
meanings.sent2: The extra credit assignment was nonobligatory for students.
meanings.sent3: Bringing snacks to the picnic was nonobligatory, but everyone appreciated it.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a nonobligatory ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The nonobligatory nature of the workshop made it more enjoyable for everyone.

meanings.sent1: Adding extra toppings to your pizza is nonobligatory.
meanings.sent2: Attending the after-work social event is nonobligatory.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a hat indoors is nonobligatory, but it can be a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a nonobligatory melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The nonobligatory dessert at the restaurant was a pleasant surprise.
